holidays.title: National Peanut Butter and Jelly Day
holidays.description: The average American eats two thousand peanut butter and jelly sandwiches before graduating high school.

holidays.title: Day of the Veterans
holidays.description: Let's take a moment to reflect on the souls of the deceased.

holidays.title: Explore Your Career Options Week
holidays.description: Are you on the best career path? Explore your options with us this week.

holidays.title: Geologists Day
holidays.description: Read on to learn more about all the amazing ways geology rocks our world.

holidays.title: International Children’s Book Day
holidays.description: Dynamite comes in small packages, especially children’s books. Buy a book and enrich a young mind.

holidays.title: International Fact-Checking Day
holidays.description: Extra, extra! Read all about it — our hot tips on how fact-checking prevents fake news!

holidays.title: National Children’s Picture Book Day
holidays.description: We have flown on scaly dragons, and eaten houses made out of candy and gingerbread.

holidays.title: National DIY Day
holidays.description: Save money and time, and spark your creativity by just doing it yourself!

holidays.title: National Ferret Day
holidays.description: Learn more about domesticated ferrets. You will be surprised by the myths you harbor about them.

holidays.title: National Love Your Produce Manager Day
holidays.description: Let's give these unsung heroes a round of applause for sourcing the freshest and best produce.

holidays.title: National Reconciliation Day
holidays.description: Mend things with that family member or colleague who was hurt by your words or deeds.

holidays.title: National Ride Your Horse to a Bar Day
holidays.description: Quirky, fun, unconventional — there are many ways to describe this day! Go ahead and enjoy it.

holidays.title: Nature Day
holidays.description: Pack some snacks and games, and move outdoors — it is picnicking day!

holidays.title: Palm Sunday
holidays.description: Palm Sunday is the beginning of Jesus’ final week on earth.

holidays.title: Pascua Florida Day
holidays.description: We have a lot more to explore beyond Florida’s beautiful shores.

holidays.title: Semana Santa Spain
holidays.description: Semana Santa is a time to remember Christ’s suffering and sacrifice for humankind.

holidays.title: Union Day of Belarus and Russia
holidays.description: We give you suggestions on how best to observe this day that united Belarus and Russia.

holidays.title: World Autism Acceptance Day
holidays.description: We’re joining forces to spread love and raise awareness about World Autism Acceptance Day.

holidays.title: World Autism Awareness Day
holidays.description: Wear blue to raise awareness on behalf of those diagnosed with autism.

holidays.title: BadBoyHalo’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are celebrating the family-friendly “Minecraft” Streamer and YouTuber, BadBoyHalo on his birthday.

holidays.title: Daniel Seavey’s Birthday
holidays.description: From the streets to the charts — Daniel James Seavey has made it big!

holidays.title: Marvin Gaye’s Birthday
holidays.description: Marvin Gaye was one of the greatest soul singers of all time.

holidays.title: Quavo Marshall’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper and songwriter is more than just a musician — he is an artist par excellence.

holidays.title: Shannon Boodram’s Birthday
holidays.description: She believes discussing sensitive topics like intimacy should no longer be taboo.

holidays.title: Traci Braxton’s Birthday
holidays.description: The multitalented songstress, actress, and reality T.V. star surely lived her life to the fullest.
